prof:
I am 25 years old. I am a front-end developer.
My passion for creating convenient and modern interfaces helps me develop high-quality and intuitive solutions for users. I am constantly improving my skills, following trends in web development and striving for professional growth. If you are looking for a responsible and passionate front-end developer who is ready to bring your ideas to life, I will be glad to cooperate!
responsibility: Responsibility: I always complete tasks and meet deadlines.
attentiveness: Attentiveness: I pay attention to detail to create quality code and interfaces.
sociability: Communication skills: I easily find a common language with the team and clients, which helps me solve problems effectively.
educationText: Studied at the Ufa State Petroleum Technological University under the bachelor's program Applied Informatics, profile Information Technology and Computer Modeling.
projectDesc5: A set of mini-games. When writing the server part, Node JS, Express and Socket.io were used. For the frontend part, Vue 3 and Tailwind CSS were used.
